blog.description:
Hi I’m Katy! I use She/her pronouns, I’m a lesbian, and a minor.

This is a multifandom blog! I post just whatever I’m invested in at the moment but it’s like 80% She-Ra

I’m also on Instagram, so check me out on @sapphicswords!

summary: My favorite part of the Nintendo Direct is just HOW EXCITED these guys are to see those two again.  It’s been so many years and...
caption: My favorite part of the Nintendo Direct is just HOW EXCITED these guys are to see those two again.  It’s been so many years and now they’re in the same game again.  Missing Conker but the Rare gang is pretty much back together.

summary: As much as I enjoyed parts of the Ubi, SE, Xbox and even Bethesda and EA presentations, there is nothing like the unbridled joy...
body: As much as I enjoyed parts of the Ubi, SE, Xbox and even Bethesda and EA presentations, there is nothing like the unbridled joy of Nintendo giving me everything I want on a silver platter without blinking. BOTW sequel! Animal Crossing! Pokémon Sword and Shield! The Witcher III on Switch! Link’s Awakening! Everything! Everything!

reblog.comment: As much as I enjoyed parts of the Ubi, SE, Xbox and even Bethesda and EA presentations, there is nothing like the unbridled joy of Nintendo giving me everything I want on a silver platter without blinking. BOTW sequel! Animal Crossing! Pokémon Sword and Shield! The Witcher III on Switch! Link’s Awakening! Everything! Everything!

trail.content_raw: As much as I enjoyed parts of the Ubi, SE, Xbox and even Bethesda and EA presentations, there is nothing like the unbridled joy of Nintendo giving me everything I want on a silver platter without blinking. BOTW sequel! Animal Crossing! Pokémon Sword and Shield! The Witcher III on Switch! Link’s Awakening! Everything! Everything!
trail.content: As much as I enjoyed parts of the Ubi, SE, Xbox and even Bethesda and EA presentations, there is nothing like the unbridled joy of Nintendo giving me everything I want on a silver platter without blinking. BOTW sequel! Animal Crossing! Pokémon Sword and Shield! The Witcher III on Switch! Link’s Awakening! Everything! Everything!

summary: Super Mario Maker 2 To Introduce Online Multiplier Via Later Update
title: Super Mario Maker 2 To Introduce Online Multiplier Via Later Update
body:
Super Mario Maker 2 To Introduce Online Multiplier Via Later Update

Fans grew concerned when the upcoming Super Mario Maker 2 originally announced that it wouldn’t have online Co-Op. Well during Nintendo’s Treehouse live-stream event and later on Twitter, they revealed that the game would be receiving online multiplayer via a later update.

https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica/status/1138532590384701440

Game producer Takashi Tezukaconfirmed that it be…

summary: LINKING A POKE BALL PLUS TO POKEMON SWORD & SHIELD GETS YOU A MEW
title: LINKING A POKE BALL PLUS TO POKEMON SWORD & SHIELD GETS YOU A MEW
body: Those who grabbed a Poké Ball Plus know that it contained the Mythical Pokémon Mew. Turns out that Mew is making its way to Pokemon Sword & Shield as well. For those who link a Poke Ball Plus to Pokemon Sword & Shield, you’ll get Mew in that game as well

reblog.comment: Those who grabbed a Poké Ball Plus know that it contained the Mythical Pokémon Mew. Turns out that Mew is making its way to Pokemon Sword & Shield as well. For those who link a Poke Ball Plus to Pokemon Sword & Shield, you’ll get Mew in that game as well

summary: So here's my Theory
body:
So here’s my Theory

A lot of people are speculating that the “now that you’ve seen both sides” line thingy, is like time travel.

Will that explain the change of hair color on Byleth?! I mean it makes sense, the time travel can make changes for few bits and pieces throughout the line of events.

I’m mostly in love with the new minty color for Byleth’s hair but yah :)

tags: mario and sonic at the olympic games
summary: Thoughts on Nintendo e3
title: Thoughts on Nintendo e3
body:
Luigi’s Mansion 3 looks really exciting! Looking forward to playing it though I’m shocked we don’t have a release date. My guess is October and since we usually have another Direct in September perhaps we’ll find out then.

It took me a bit to get pumped for ‘The Hero’ being announced for Smash. Dragon Quest always looked interesting to me but I never got around to playing it myself. The hero with the bandanna looks really cool though so I think I’ll be playing as him in Smash Bros. I also preordered Dragon Quest 11 (really long title) Definitive Edition so I hope I enjoy that. Said bandanna boy is the protag to the 8th game which has a 3DS port apparently, so I might check that out. Got to save my money.

To be honest, most of all else were pretty meh to me. Especially since I knew going in what I already wanted I hoped something new would pull me in and just Dragon Quest is something I’m going to try to get into.

Not going to lie. I first thought Dixie Kong was going to be the Smash character. I knew she wouldn’t because they’re going after different franchises but I didn’t expect a crossover trailer like that. Never got into the Banjo Kazooie hype, but his inclusion makes people happy and his stage looks awesome, so I ain’t mad. Just kind of wish they did his trailer different so I wouldn’t have gotten my unrealistic hopes up. Although seeing Banjo is Rare, I can see where it came from.

Breath of the Wild 2 is something to look forward to but I know it’ll likely be years before its officially released so I’m holding my excitement a bit.

Mario and Sonic at the 2020 Olympic Games, I am definitely getting. The new sports look awesome and I can’t wait to play with Tails and Yoshi. I noticed that the characters seem to have custom outfits, so I think that might mean we won’t be seeing Miis. Which is such a shame. I’m disappointed how much Miis have been put the sidelines. Maybe it’s too early to say and they just didn’t use them for the trailer, but I hope Miis aren’t gone.

Lastly, Animal Crossing looks so awesome on the Switch! Disappointed we now have to wait until March 20 2020, but if it makes it a better game, then it’ll be worth it. But still…9 months is such a long wait!!

summary: COLLECTION OF MANA - GAMEPLAY FOOTAGE
title: COLLECTION OF MANA - GAMEPLAY FOOTAGE
